title: Architect Abby
author: Archivist Eryndra
pages: Architect Abby crafts a world of creativity through practical and aesthetic building. Her writings animate blocks in ways that inspire new construction.
Abby marvels at potential, drawing builders into visions of castles, boats, or dreamy gardens, ambitiously accessible.
She is prolific, having created seven works spanning the realms of practicality and beauty, weaving architecture as an art form.
